site.hero_headline: We accelerate any challenge into practical solutions and measurable outcomes.
site.hero_subhead: HuTech Product Studio, part of HuTech Ventures, works across product, operational, and growth challenges using a structured model from Problem to Prototype to Minimum Awesome Product.

brand_distinction.message: HuTech Ventures and HuTech Tech are separate initiatives. This site represents HuTech Product Studio within HuTech Ventures.

capabilities.title: Product Opportunity Framing
capabilities.description: Align on outcomes, users, constraints, and success metrics before engineering begins.

capabilities.title: Rapid Prototype Engineering
capabilities.description: Ship realistic prototypes that test interaction quality and technical feasibility early.

capabilities.title: Validation and Handoff
capabilities.description: Convert pilot learnings into measurable recommendations and implementation-ready artifacts.

process_steps.title: Problem
process_steps.description: Define the business problem, target users, and measurable outcomes before building.

process_steps.title: Prototype
process_steps.description: Build and iterate a focused solution slice to test feasibility and user value quickly.

process_steps.title: Minimum Awesome Product
process_steps.description: Convert the prototype into a launch-ready Minimum Awesome Product with integrations and automation in about 2 months total.

case_studies.title: Business Card Intelligence and Follow-up Automation
case_studies.problem: Internal GTM teams collected business cards but relied on manual data entry, delaying follow-up and causing lost leads.
case_studies.prototype: Built a business card scanning tool that extracts contact details, enriches profiles with LinkedIn information, and syncs contacts automatically.
case_studies.outcome: Sales teams can trigger immediate outreach and automated follow-up campaigns instead of manually chasing contacts.
case_studies.metrics: Reduced post-event contact processing time and accelerated first-touch email response windows.
case_studies.redaction_note: Internal CRM workflow logic is intentionally redacted.

seo.title: HuTech Product Studio | Part of HuTech Ventures
seo.description: HuTech Product Studio, part of HuTech Ventures, accelerates any challenge into practical solutions and measurable outcomes.
seo.og_title: HuTech Product Studio | Part of HuTech Ventures
seo.og_description: We accelerate product, operational, and growth challenges into practical outcomes.
